entries.transmission_start: General Ufwol: < Our recovery team is in position at the wreck and have begun the operation. >
entries.transmission_received: General Ufwol: < The recovery team is done and pulling out! >
entries.trans_update: General Ufwol: < Our recovery team is about %DI percent done. Hang in there pilot! >
entries.title_d: A pirate attack in the Dathomir system against the Empires forces took out one of these new Imperial prototype ships. It's fairly intact and one of our nearby recovery teams are moving in to collect it. Unfortunately the Empire is also moving in with a large force to make sure that nothing important was left behind by the pirates. You need to guard one of the possible routes that the Empires forces may take and prevent any of them from getting past you. The rest of our squadron is spread out guarding other intercept routes so you will be on your own out there. Good luck pilot!
entries.title: Dathomir system: Protect the Alliance recovery team.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: These are the coordinates assigned for you to defend. Keep an eye out for any enemy presence and let none get past you.
entries.quest_location_d: The area you're heading in to have been the subject of several pirate attacks lately so be careful. As if that wasn't enough though, the amount of Imperial forces closing in is staggering.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: Our reconnaissance ships are picking up several incoming Imperial fighters. Prepare for battle and make us proud pilot!
entries.outofrange_failed: General Ufwol: < Our recovery team is getting pounded by enemy fighters and are forced to retreat. You are to return to base immediately! >
entries.outofrange: General Ufwol: < You are too far from your assigned area, get back there now pilot! >
entries.mission_complete: You came through in the end after all, good.
entries.found_loc: A pirate attack took out one of the Empires new ships and it's fairly intact. We have a recovery team nearby but the Empire is on their way as well. Proceed to these coordinates.
entries.first_attack: Here they come pilot, make me proud!
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: You are in the correct position pilot. Keep any ships out of the area until our recovery team is done, at all costs!
